definition: see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
Katyusha (name)/name of a Russian wartime song/nickname of a rocket launcher used by the Red Army in WWII
Shakespeare/slang or popular culture abbr. of 莎士比亞|莎士比亚[Sha1 shi4 bi3 ya4]

pinyin: De2 guo2 Han4 sha1 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

definition: Marks and Spencers, UK retail chain/Martha (name)
Yeken nahiyisi (Yarkand county or Shache) in Kashgar prefecture 喀什地區|喀什地区[Ka1 shi2 di4 qu1], west Xinjiang
Ayshe, Aise or Ayesha (name)/Aishah bint Abi Bakr (c. 614-678), youngest wife of prophet Mohamed 穆罕默德[Mu4 han3 mo4 de2]

sentences.english: Sharapova lost to Sam Stosur in her opening match on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 週二莎拉波娃在她的首場比賽中輸給了薩姆斯托瑟。

sentences.english: Elisa started at the sound of her husband's voice.
sentences.chinese: 聽到丈夫的聲音，伊利莎吃了一驚。

sentences.english: I'm a stock broker, Tosha, and you.
sentences.chinese: 我是股票經紀人，託莎，你呢。

sentences.english: HEROD: Salome come and sit next to me.
Tamitha, who had diabetes and ulcers, began to tremble.
sentences.chinese: 患有糖尿病和潰瘍的塔米莎不禁冷得開始打顫。

sentences.english: Ann: Why do you say that Tang Xianzu is Shakespare of China?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼你說湯顯祖是中國的莎幹比亞？

sentences.english: Marissa cruised through Dannerville's second light and continued toward the coast.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗莎駕車通過丹維爾的第二個紅綠燈，朝海岸開去。

sentences.english: Aisha fled to escape beatings and other abuse.
sentences.chinese: 阿伊莎想要逃離暴力和虐待。

sentences.english: Sniffed it with pleasure then clinked his glass to hers.
sentences.chinese: 先高興的聞了聞，再舉起杯和瑪麗莎碰了碰。

sentences.english: The Princess Salome desires to see him.
Maybe there had even been others during Louise’s pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 甚至在露易莎懷孕期間說不定還有別人。

sentences.english: When it premiered at this year's Edinburgh film festival, I paid for Vanessa to fly over.
sentences.chinese: 在愛丁堡電影節首映的時候，我邀請了瓦妮莎參加。

sentences.english: Welcome to the first CarnEVIL party at Circus Barbarossa.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到芭芭露莎第一屆鬼屋嘉年華萬聖節派對。

sentences.english: Akasha is one of the many souls claimed by the blade, Frostmourne.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡莎是死於嘆霜之劍下的無數亡魂之一。

sentences.english: Far ahead on the road Elisa saw a dark speck.
sentences.chinese: 遠遠的，伊利莎看到路上有個黑點。

sentences.english: Esperanza moves into a new home on Mango Street.
sentences.chinese: 埃斯佩朗莎搬到了芒果街上的一個新家。

definition: (phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
Hailun county level city in Suihua 綏化|绥化, Heilongjiang/Helen or Hélène (name)
